subject: Re: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: ... I ll include it anyway in case others wonder what I mean by an automated build process that keeps the JavaDoc and code in sync:
messageBody:
Richard Brooks wrote:

> Never mind, dumb question. I was reading "automatic javadoc generation"
> and that's not what you were talking about at all. Duh. :-)
>

I'll include it anyway in case others wonder what I mean by an automated
build process that keeps the JavaDoc and code in sync:

<target name="all" depends="compile,test,doc"/>

<target name="doc">

<javadoc packagenames="com.whatever.*"
sourcepath="${src.dir}"
destdir="${docs.dir}/api"
author="true"
version="true"
windowtitle="${Name} API"
doctitle="${Name} API"
bottom="${copyright}">
</javadoc>

</target>

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
